verses.verse: And <WG2532> he began<WG756> to speak<WG3004> unto them<WG846> by<WG1722> parables.<WG3850> A certain man<WG444> planted<WG5452> a vineyard,<WG290> and<WG2532> set an hedge about <WG4060> <WG5418> it, and<WG2532> digged<WG3736> a place for the wine vat,<WG5276> and<WG2532> built<WG3618> a tower,<WG4444> and<WG2532> let it out <WG1554> <WG846> to husbandmen,<WG1092> and<WG2532> went into a far country. <WG589>

And <WG2532> at the<WG3588> season<WG2540> he sent<WG649> to<WG4314> the<WG3588> husbandmen<WG1092> a servant,<WG1401> that<WG2443> he might receive<WG2983> from<WG3844> the<WG3588> husbandmen<WG1092> of<WG575> the<WG3588> fruit<WG2590> of the<WG3588> vineyard. <WG290>
And <WG1161> they<WG3588> caught<WG2983> him, and beat<WG1194> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> sent him away<WG649> empty. <WG2756>

And <WG2532> again<WG3825> he sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> them<WG846> another<WG243> servant;<WG1401> and at him<WG2548> they cast stones,<WG3036> and wounded him in the head,<WG2775> and<WG2532> sent him away<WG649> shamefully handled. <WG821>

And <WG2532> again<WG3825> he sent<WG649> another;<WG243> and him<WG2548> they killed,<WG615> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> others;<WG243> beating<WG1194> some, <WG3588> <WG3303> and <WG1161> killing<WG615> some. <WG3588>

Having <WG2192> yet<WG2089> therefore<WG3767> one<WG1520> son,<WG5207> his<WG848> well-beloved,<WG27> he sent<WG649> him<WG846> also<WG2532> last<WG2078> unto<WG4314> them,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> They will reverence<WG1788> my<WG3450> son. <WG5207>

But <WG1161> those<WG1565> husbandmen<WG1092> said<WG2036> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG1438> This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> heir;<WG2818> come,<WG1205> let us kill<WG615> him,<WG846> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> inheritance<WG2817> shall be<WG2071> ours. <WG2257>
And <WG2532> they took<WG2983> him,<WG846> and killed<WG615> him, and<WG2532> cast<WG1544> him out<WG1854> of the<WG3588> vineyard. <WG290>

What <WG5101> shall therefore<WG3767> the<WG3588> lord<WG2962> of the<WG3588> vineyard<WG290> do?<WG4160> he will come<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroy<WG622> the<WG3588> husbandmen,<WG1092> and<WG2532> will give<WG1325> the<WG3588> vineyard<WG290> unto others. <WG243>

And have ye not<WG3761> read<WG314> this<WG5026> Scripture; <WG1124> The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the<WG3588> builders<WG3618> rejected<WG593> is<WG3778> become<WG1096> the<WG1519> head<WG2776> of the corner: <WG1137>
This <WG3778> was<WG1096> the Lord's doing, <WG3844> <WG2962> and <WG2532> it is<WG2076> marvelous<WG2298> in<WG1722> our<WG2254> eyes? <WG3788>

And <WG2532> they sought<WG2212> to lay hold on<WG2902> him,<WG846> but<WG2532> feared<WG5399> the<WG3588> people:<WG3793> for<WG1063> they knew<WG1097> that<WG3754> he had spoken<WG2036> the<WG3588> parable<WG3850> against<WG4314> them:<WG846> and<WG2532> they left<WG863> him,<WG846> and went their way.<WG565>

And <WG2532> they send<WG649> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> certain<WG5100> of the<WG3588> Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> Herodians,<WG2265> to<WG2443> catch<WG64> him<WG846> in his words.<WG3056>

And <WG1161> when they<WG3588> were come,<WG2064> they say<WG3004> unto him,<WG846> Master,<WG1320> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> thou art<WG1488> true,<WG227> and<WG2532> <WG3756> carest<WG3199> <WG4671> for<WG4012> no man:<WG3762> for<WG1063> thou regardest<WG991> not<WG3756> the<WG1519> person<WG4383> of men,<WG444> but<WG235> teachest<WG1321> the<WG3588> way<WG3598> of God<WG2316> in<WG1909> truth:<WG225> Is it lawful<WG1832> to give<WG1325> tribute<WG2778> to Caesar,<WG2541> or<WG2228> not?<WG3756>

Shall we give,<WG1325> or<WG2228> shall we not<WG3361> give?<WG1325> But<WG1161> he,<WG3588> knowing<WG1492> their<WG846> hypocrisy,<WG5272> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Why <WG5101> tempt<WG3985> ye me?<WG3165> bring<WG5342> me<WG3427> a penny,<WG1220> that<WG2443> I may see<WG1492> it.

And <WG1161> they<WG3588> brought<WG5342> it. And<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Whose <WG5101> is this<WG3778> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> superscription? <WG1923> And<WG1161> they<WG3588> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Caesar's.<WG2541>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Render <WG591> to Caesar<WG2541> the things<WG3588> that are Caesar's,<WG2541> and<WG2532> to God<WG2316> the things<WG3588> that are God's. <WG2316> And<WG2532> they marveled<WG2296> at<WG1909> him.<WG846>

Then <WG2532> come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> the Sadducees,<WG4523> which<WG3748> say<WG3004> there is<WG1511> no<WG3361> resurrection;<WG386> and<WG2532> they asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004>

Master, <WG1320> Moses<WG3475> wrote<WG1125> unto us,<WG2254> If<WG1437> a man's<WG5100> brother<WG80> die,<WG599> and<WG2532> leave<WG2641> his wife<WG1135> behind him, and<WG2532> leave<WG863> no<WG3361> children,<WG5043> that<WG2443> his<WG848> brother<WG80> should take<WG2983> his<WG846> wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> raise up<WG1817> seed<WG4690> unto his<WG846> brother.<WG80>
Now there were<WG2258> seven<WG2033> brethren:<WG80> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> first<WG4413> took<WG2983> a wife,<WG1135> and<WG2532> dying<WG599> left<WG863> no<WG3756> seed.<WG4690>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> second<WG1208> took<WG2983> her,<WG846> and<WG2532> died,<WG599> neither<WG3761> left<WG863> he<WG846> any seed:<WG4690> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> third<WG5154> likewise.<WG5615>
And <WG2532> the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> had<WG2983> her,<WG846> and<WG2532> left<WG863> no<WG3756> seed:<WG4690> last<WG2078> of all<WG3956> the<WG3588> woman<WG1135> died<WG599> also.<WG2532>

In <WG1722> the<WG3588> resurrection<WG386> therefore,<WG3767> when<WG3752> they shall rise,<WG450> whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> shall she be<WG2071> of them?<WG846> for<WG1063> the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> had<WG2192> her<WG846> to wife.<WG1135>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto them,<WG846> Do ye not<WG3756> therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> err, <WG4105> because ye know<WG1492> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> Scriptures,<WG1124> neither<WG3366> the<WG3588> power<WG1411> of God? <WG2316>

For <WG1063> when<WG3752> they shall rise<WG450> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> they neither<WG3777> marry,<WG1060> nor<WG3777> are given in marriage;<WG1061> but<WG235> are<WG1526> as<WG5613> the angels<WG32> which<WG3588> are in<WG1722> heaven. <WG3772>

And <WG1161> as touching<WG4012> the<WG3588> dead,<WG3498> that<WG3754> they rise: <WG1453> have ye not<WG3756> read<WG314> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> book<WG976> of Moses,<WG3475> how<WG5613> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> bush<WG942> God<WG2316> spake<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> saying,<WG3004> I<WG1473> am the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Abraham,<WG11> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Isaac,<WG2464> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of Jacob? <WG2384>
He is<WG2076> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> God<WG2316> of the dead,<WG3498> but<WG235> the God<WG2316> of the living: <WG2198> ye<WG5210> therefore<WG3767> do greatly<WG4183> err. <WG4105>

And <WG2532> one<WG1520> of the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> came,<WG4334> and having heard<WG191> them<WG846> reasoning together,<WG4802> and perceiving<WG1492> that<WG3754> he had answered<WG611> them<WG846> well,<WG2573> asked<WG1905> him,<WG846> Which<WG4169> is<WG2076> the first<WG4413> commandment<WG1785> of all?<WG3956>

And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him,<WG846> The first<WG4413> of all<WG3956> the<WG3588> commandments<WG1785> is, Hear,<WG191> O Israel;<WG2474> The Lord<WG2962> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> one<WG1520> Lord: <WG2962>

And <WG2532> thou shalt love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG2316> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> heart,<WG2588> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> soul,<WG5590> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> mind,<WG1271> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> strength: <WG2479> this<WG3778> is the first<WG4413> commandment. <WG1785>

And <WG2532> the second<WG1208> is like,<WG3664> namely this,<WG3778> Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbor<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself.<WG4572> There is<WG2076> none<WG3756> other<WG243> commandment<WG1785> greater<WG3187> than these. <WG5130>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> scribe<WG1122> said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Well,<WG2573> Master,<WG1320> thou hast said<WG2036> the<WG1909> truth:<WG225> for<WG3754> there is<WG2076> one<WG1520> God;<WG2316> and<WG2532> there is<WG2076> none<WG3756> other<WG243> but<WG4133> he: <WG846>

And <WG2532> to love<WG25> him<WG846> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> heart<WG2588> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> understanding,<WG4907> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> soul,<WG5590> and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> strength,<WG2479> and<WG2532> to love<WG25> his neighbor<WG4139> as<WG5613> himself,<WG1438> is<WG2076> more<WG4119> than all<WG3956> whole burnt offerings<WG3646> and<WG2532> sacrifices.<WG2378>

And <WG2532> when Jesus<WG2424> saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he answered<WG611> discreetly<WG3562> he said<WG2036> unto him,<WG846> Thou art<WG1488> not<WG3756> far<WG3112> from<WG575> the<WG3588> kingdom<WG932> of God. <WG2316> And<WG2532> no man<WG3762> after that<WG3765> durst<WG5111> ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any question.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said,<WG3004> while he taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> temple,<WG2411> How <WG4459> say<WG3004> the<WG3588> scribes<WG1122> that<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> is<WG2076> the son<WG5207> of David? <WG1138>

For <WG1063> David<WG1138> himself<WG846> said<WG2036> by<WG1722> the<WG3588> Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> the<WG3588> LORD<WG2962> said<WG2036> to my <WG3450> LORD, <WG2962> Sit<WG2521> thou on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand,<WG1188> till <WG2193> <WG302> I make<WG5087> thine<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> thy footstool. <WG5286> <WG4675> <WG4228>

David <WG1138> therefore<WG3767> himself<WG846> calleth<WG3004> him<WG846> Lord;<WG2962> and<WG2532> whence<WG4159> is<WG2076> he then his<WG846> son? <WG5207> And<WG2532> the<WG3588> common<WG4183> people<WG3793> heard<WG191> him<WG846> gladly.<WG2234>

And <WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846> in<WG1722> his<WG848> doctrine,<WG1322> Beware <WG991> of<WG575> the<WG3588> scribes,<WG1122> which love<WG2309> to go<WG4043> in<WG1722> long clothing,<WG4749> and<WG2532> love salutations<WG783> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> marketplaces, <WG58>
And <WG2532> the chief seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> synagogues,<WG4864> and<WG2532> the uppermost rooms<WG4411> at<WG1722> feasts: <WG1173>
Which devour<WG2719> widows'<WG5503> houses,<WG3614> and<WG2532> for a pretence<WG4392> make long prayers: <WG4336> <WG3117> these <WG3778> shall receive<WG2983> greater<WG4055> damnation. <WG2917>

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> sat<WG2523> over against<WG2713> the<WG3588> treasury,<WG1049> and beheld<WG2334> how<WG4459> the<WG3588> people<WG3793> cast<WG906> money<WG5475> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> treasury:<WG1049> and<WG2532> many<WG4183> that were rich<WG4145> cast in<WG906> much.<WG4183>
And <WG2532> there came<WG2064> a certain<WG3391> poor<WG4434> widow,<WG5503> and she threw in<WG906> two<WG1417> mites,<WG3016> which make<WG3603> a farthing.<WG2835>

And <WG2532> he called<WG4341> unto him his<WG848> disciples,<WG3101> and saith<WG3004> unto them,<WG846> Verily <WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you,<WG5213> That<WG3754> this<WG3778> poor<WG4434> widow<WG5503> hath cast more in, <WG906> <WG4119> than all<WG3956> they which have cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> treasury: <WG1049>

For <WG1063> all<WG3956> they did cast in<WG906> of<WG1537> their<WG846> abundance;<WG4052> but<WG1161> she<WG3778> of<WG1537> her<WG848> want<WG5304> did cast in<WG906> all<WG3956> that<WG3745> she had,<WG2192> even all<WG3650> her<WG848> living. <WG979>
